metadata.title: Microsoft OneNote 2016 Security Technical Implementation Guide – I - Mission Critical Sensitive
metadata.remarks: The Microsoft OneNote 2016 Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) is published as a tool to improve the security of Department of Defense (DoD) information systems.  Comments or proposed revisions to this document should be sent via e-mail to the following address: disa.stig_spt@mail.mil.
